title: Sales forecast for eye care product Restasis in U.S. 2014 to 2025
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Sales in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
Overall Sales in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Sales in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2020, roughly constant from 2020 to 2023, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2023 to 2025.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2023 and 2024.
Maximum Sales in million U.S. dollars, about 2332.0 was reported at Year 2023
Minimum Sales in million U.S. dollars about 1084.0 was reached at Year 2014
